Hello. At usage Excel5 the method getTabColor does not save result.
WorkItem.Summary: Color Tab (Color Sheet's name) [Excel5 reader/writer support]

Comments.Message:
PHPExcel_Reader_Excel5 and PHPExcel_Writer_Excel5 should be able to handle sheet tab colors the way Microsoft Office Excel 2003 handles it.

There are some slight differences with Excel files produced by MS Office Excel 2007 vs. 2003, and PHPExcel_Reader_Excel5 is not able to read sheet tab colors for .xls files produced by MS Office Excel 2007. This can perhaps be fixed in a separate work item.
